text: NEG is an abbreviation that may refer to: * the IATA code for Negril Aerodrome in Jamaica * Net energy gain * New economic geography, a sub-field of Economic geography * Non-evaporable getter, a material used in high vacuum technology * Negative (disambiguation), in various contexts, and a common military command * Negotiator, e.g. estate agent * National Express, a UK-based transport group * NEG Micon, now part of Vestas * Nippon Electric Glass, a Japanese glass manufacturer * Noah Eli Gordon, an American poet * National Energy Guarantee, an energy policy in Australia It may also refer to someone with the name Neg: * Neg Dupree, of Neg's Urban Sports
title: NEG
